Detailed Description

Class describing the packet sent to the UserModule to check the transaction days for a user.

After the general RequestPacket-header the format is: {tabular}{rll} Position & Size & Description \ 0 & 4 bytes & UIN\ 4 & 4 bytes & nbrTransactions \ 8 & 1 bytes & Check \ {tabular}
